description: Creates and updates the retention configuration with details about retention period (number of days) that Config stores your historical information. The API creates the RetentionConfiguration object and names the object as default. When you have a RetentionConfiguration object named default, calling the API modifies the default object.

parameters.name: RetentionPeriodInDays
parameters.description: Number of days Config stores your historical information.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the retention configuration object.

nested_items.name: RetentionPeriodInDays
nested_items.description: Number of days Config stores your historical information.
